com.wackycow.cish4210.trains
Class TrainsGraph

java.lang.Object
  com.wackycow.cish4210.trains.TrainsGraph

public class TrainsGraph
extends java.lang.Object

TrainsGraph is the graph that maintains the structure and enforces the rules of the simulation. It maintains the current state of the graph, the Dispatcher used to schedule the trains, the trains themselves and which stations they are at, and a list of objects used to synchronize the stations to enforce deadlocks when the trains are not scheduled correctly.

Field Summary
private  com.wackycow.cish4210.trains.Dispatcher dispatcher
          The Dispatcher that is checked whenever a train attempts to move.
private  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> monitors
          A HashMap of objects (keyed on the station ID) used to enforce the deadlock condition when trains are not correctly scheduled.
private  cytoscape.CyNetwork network
          The Cytoscape CyNetwork that is used to store the nodes and edges that will be traversed by the trains.
private  boolean stop
          A flag indicating whether the TrainsGraph system has been stopped.
private  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.wackycow.cish4210.trains.Train> trains
          A HashMap of the stations and which trains are present at each station.
